1304.question: how was annotation done?
1304.response: {'Answer': 'The annotation was done manually, categorized into different classes such as "Intention," "Disclosure," "Interpretation," and "Response," likely based on the textual analysis of interactions, and performance metrics such as Precision (P), Recall (R), and F1-Score (F1) were used to evaluate the quality of the annotations.'}
1304.answer: Annotation was done with the help of annotators from Amazon Mechanical Turk on snippets of conversations
